hero.title: Your journey to academic success
hero.subtitle: At My Private Tutor Online, we offer more than just tutoring‚Äîwe provide thoughtful, expert advice at every stage of your child's academic journey.
hero.description: Our service is consultative, personal, and bespoke to your family's individual needs.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: You begin with a **one-to-one conversation** with our **Founder Elizabeth** to understand your child's **academic profile, personality, and goals**.

steps.title: Tiered Tutoring Options
steps.description: Whether your child needs general **mentoring** or **specialist preparation**, our **flexible tiered tutoring model** allows you to choose the level of support that fits your child's needs and your budget. Specialist tutoring begins at just **¬£45 per hour**. Unlike many other providers, we don't charge **registration or administrative fees**‚Äîyou only pay for your time with a **carefully matched, dedicated tutor**.
features: **Tier 1:** Official examiners - **Insider tips, tricks and exam technique for top grades**
**Tier 2:** Qualified teachers - **Specialist support from seasoned schoolteachers**
**Tier 3:** University graduates - **Mentoring from experts in their specific subject**

steps.title: Expert Tutor Matching
steps.description: Elizabeth **worked alongside** the majority of our tutors **as colleagues** during her international career. The rest come to us via **personal recommendations** from our trusted team, selecting only those with an **outstanding educational pedigree, impressive tutoring background** and **passion for nurturing young minds**. She brings this **deep personal knowledge** to every match, pairing students with not only a **perfectly qualified tutor**, but also a **personality they will resonate well with**.
features: **Heads of Department** at top 10 UK schools
**Accredited GCSE, A Level and IB examiners**

steps.title: Progress Reports & Support
steps.description: To ensure **meaningful progress**, your tutor submits a **detailed report after every lesson**‚Äîincluding what was covered, **homework assigned**, and **clear feedback** on your child's strengths and areas for development. Each report combines **quantitative ratings with qualitative insights**, giving you a **well-rounded view** of your child's performance. Reports are **automatically emailed** and available at any time via your **secure login**. You'll also receive **automated lesson reminders 36 hours before each session**, keeping everything running smoothly with **minimal effort on your part**.
features: **Clear feedback** on strengths and development areas

steps.title: Ongoing Support & Educational Partnership
steps.description:
At My Private Tutor Online, our commitment doesn't end with a successful tutor match‚Äî**it begins there**. We offer **Ongoing consultative support** to ensure your child continues to thrive.

Our **Highly responsive team** is always available to assist, whether it's rescheduling a session or tweaking lesson focus in light of a school report or parents' evening feedback. We work closely with you to ensure each tutorial remains **purposeful and aligned** with your child's evolving needs.
features: **Highly responsive team** always available to assist
**Flexible lesson adjustments** based on school feedback
**Long-term educational partnership** from early years to university

tutorProfilesSection.title: Get to Know a Selection of Our Tutors
tutorProfilesSection.description:
Here's a curated cross-section of our team, capturing **the calibre and diversity of educators across tiers.** This is just a glimpse; **our full team spans every age, subject and academic stage**, from preschool phonics to postgraduate Astrophysics.

Simply **complete our short enquiry form**, and a member of our team will be in touch to start the conversation.

profiles.name: Alma
profiles.title: Maths & Science Specialist

experience.description: 10,000+ hours of online tutoring with classroom experience across independents, grammars, academies & state schools

achievements.title: Official Examiner
achievements.description: Examiner for GCSE & A Level Maths and Science

achievements.title: Extensive Teaching Experience
achievements.description: Classroom experience across independents, grammars, academies & state schools

profiles.bio: Alma holds a First-Class MSci in Astrophysics from UCL, a PGCE in Secondary Maths from IoE, and studied Cognitive Psychology at Cambridge. As an official examiner for GCSE & A Level Maths and Science, she brings 10,000+ hours of online tutoring experience with classroom expertise across independents, grammars, academies & state schools.

testimonial.quote: She's making a huge difference to both my kids‚Ä¶ they come away from lessons really buoyant.
testimonial.author: Parent

teachingStyle.approach: Scientific and methodical, building understanding through practical application

profiles.name: John
profiles.title: History Specialist

experience.description:
16+ years teaching experience
11 years as Head of History
4 years at Uppingham School (top independent school)
Current Assistant Director of Studies with Senior Leadership responsibilities
eliteSchools: Current **Assistant Director of Studies** with Senior Leadership responsibilities

profiles.bio:
John is an accomplished History educator with over sixteen years of classroom experience, including more than a decade leading History departments. He currently serves as **Head of History** and **Assistant Director of Studies** at a high-performing state school, following four years at **Uppingham School**, one of the UK's leading independent schools.

A **seasoned GCSE and A Level examiner**, John combines his deep subject expertise with a sharp understanding of assessment criteria. His teaching is rigorous yet engaging, helping students develop both critical thinking and exam precision. He also designs and leads **intensive revision courses**, where students have achieved remarkable improvements ‚Äî including **one pupil who rose from a D to an A grade.**

With his blend of leadership experience, examiner insight, and proven results, John offers exceptional academic guidance for students aiming for top grades in History.

testimonial.quote: John's sessions have really turned around History for me. His feedback is so clear and his enthusiasm makes even tough topics enjoyable.
testimonial.author: A-Level History Student

teachingStyle.approach: Rigorous yet engaging, combining deep subject expertise with exam precision and leadership experience

profiles.name: Emily
profiles.title: Entrance Exam Expert

experience.description: Former teacher at Latymer, Merchant Taylors, North London Collegiate with official 11+ examiner experience
eliteSchools: Staff member at Latymer (top 10 London grammar)
Staff member at Merchant Taylors (leading independent school)
Staff member at North London Collegiate (top 3 girls' school in the UK)

achievements.title: Official 11+ Examiner
achievements.description: Official 11+ examiner and assisted identifying top scholars

image.alt: Emily - Entrance Exam Expert, History & Politics

profiles.bio: Emily holds a BA History from Cambridge and PGCE from Oxford. A former teacher at Latymer, Merchant Taylors, and North London Collegiate, she serves as an official 11+ examiner. She has supported their admissions process and has insider knowledge of what the most oversubscribed schools are looking for in candidates. Her students consistently win places at top institutions including Eton, Harrow, and other prestigious institutions.

testimonial.quote: Offers from St Paul's, Westminster, Highgate and UCS. We can't believe it!
testimonial.author: Parent

teachingStyle.approach: Elite preparation with strategic entrance exam technique and historical analysis
